Ascendify | Multiple Positions | San Francisco | Onsite | https://talent.ascendify.com/

OUR CULTURE

Weâ€™re a small, world-class agile team and we expect you to be at top of your game. We offer a competitive benefits package, a great office, and all the latest tools you need to produce your best work. Ascendify is committed to learning and development of our Engineering team. We'll support you with off-site courses and hands-on training in the application. Your role will grow as the company grows in whatever way best suits your skills and interests. Ascendify is located at 530 Bush Street, just a short walk away from BART and Muni stations, near everything the Financial District has to offer.

Need: Scala, QA, Front End (react)
